rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entryway with Scandinavian minimalist design incorporating natural light and Vastu-aligned positioning at the north-west.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open concept living area facing east for abundant morning light, designed in Scandinavian style with clean lines and natural materials. It adheres to Vastu principles by aligning seating positions towards the east.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern dining area integrated within the living room space for a seamless flow, with ample light from north-facing windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped Scandinavian kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and storage solutions. Vastu guidelines ensure the stove is placed in the southeast.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space featuring soundproofing, ergonomic design, and north-facing natural light as per Scandinavian aesthetics and Vastu for productivity.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Service area including laundry facilities, storage, and additional utilities. Placed in the southwest corner following Vastu guidelines to maintain balance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample window space for natural light from the east; includes an ensuite bathroom. The room is designed in Scandinavian style with a warm color palette and built-in storage.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed to maintain privacy, also following Vastu principles by positioning the bed away from sharp corners.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Another bedroom with similar design features and natural light from east to ensure a restful environment. Vastu recommendations are considered in layout planning.

openings.description: Large entrance door designed to invite positive energy and adhere to Vastu by aligning with the north-west.
Large windows ensuring ample natural light. Windows in living areas face east to enhance morning brightness, while bedroom windows are strategically placed.
Double car garage entrance providing easy access and designed with a Scandinavian aesthetic that aligns with the overall structure.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Well-lit guest bedroom with north-facing windows. Design includes Scandinavian simplicity and Vastu principles for a harmonious living environment.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom offering privacy and comfort, with eastward window placement to enhance natural lighting and promote restful sleep.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Full bathroom suite designed for guest convenience with Scandinavian fixtures and finishes, placed in the southeast following Vastu guidelines.

openings.location: Between Ground Floor and First Floor
openings.description: Elegant staircase connecting levels with Scandinavian design elements ensuring safety and adherence to Vastu flow.
Windowed balcony providing a view of the rooftop terrace. The west-facing position respects local norms and Vastu considerations.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive open-air terrace with Scandinavian design elements, offering a space for relaxation and entertainment. It is designed to maximize natural light and ventilation while considering Vastu principles.

openings.description: Large skylight ensuring ample daylight on the terrace while maintaining privacy. Vastu-aligned to enhance positive energy.

rooms.name: Two-Car Garage
rooms.description: Dual-car garage designed with Scandinavian minimalism and functionality. The layout optimizes space for vehicle storage while incorporating Vastu guidelines for energy flow.

openings.description: Durable garage door ensuring ease of access and aligning with the structural design.
